Package com.w10.risk_game.utils.maps

Class ConquestMapDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.w10.risk_game.utils.maps.ConquestMapDriver
  • public class ConquestMapDriver
extends Object
    The ConquestMapDriver class is responsible for loading and saving Conquest game maps in the Conquest file format.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConquestGameMap loadMapFile​(String p_mapFilePath)
      The function `loadMapFile` reads a Conquest game map file, extracts the continents and countries information, and returns a ConquestGameMap object containing the loaded data.
      private Continent mapContinent​(String p_line, int p_lineNumber)
      The function takes a line of text and a line number, splits the line into values using the "=" delimiter, and creates a new Continent object with the line number, the first value as the name, and the second value as the population.
      private Country mapTerritory​(String p_line, int p_lineNumber, LinkedHashMap<String,​Continent> p_continents, LinkedHashMap<String,​String[]> p_countryNameToNeighborNames)
      The function maps a territory by creating a Country object and adding it to the list of countries in a continent, while also storing the neighboring countries.
      protected LinkedHashMap<String,​Continent> readContinents​(Scanner p_scanner)
      The function reads continent data from a scanner and returns a LinkedHashMap of continents.

      The function reads territory information from a scanner and creates a map of countries with their neighbors.
      void saveMap​(String p_filePath, ConquestGameMap p_gameMap)
      The function `saveMap` saves a ConquestGameMap object to a file in a specific format.

    • Method Detail

      • loadMapFile

        public ConquestGameMap loadMapFile​(String p_mapFilePath)
        The function `loadMapFile` reads a Conquest game map file, extracts the continents and countries information, and returns a ConquestGameMap object containing the loaded data.
        Parameters:
        p_mapFilePath - The file path of the map file that needs to be loaded.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a ConquestGameMap object.

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap​(String p_filePath,
                    ConquestGameMap p_gameMap)
        The function `saveMap` saves a ConquestGameMap object to a file in a specific format.
        Parameters:
        p_filePath - The file path where the map will be saved.
        p_gameMap - The parameter `p_gameMap` is an instance of the `ConquestGameMap` class, which represents the game map for the Conquest game. It contains information about continents, countries, and their connections.

      • readContinents

        protected LinkedHashMap<String,​Continent> readContinents​(Scanner p_scanner)
        The function reads continent data from a scanner and returns a LinkedHashMap of continents.
        Parameters:
        p_scanner - A Scanner object used to read input from a file or other source.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a map of continents by continent name

      • readTerritories

        protected LinkedHashMap<String,​Country> readTerritories​(Scanner p_scanner,
                                                              LinkedHashMap<String,​Continent> p_continents)
        The function reads territory information from a scanner and creates a map of countries with their neighbors.
        Parameters:
        p_scanner - A Scanner object used to read input from a file or other source.
        p_continents - A LinkedHashMap containing the continents in the game, where the key is the continent name and the value is the Continent object.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a map of countries by country name object.

      • mapContinent

        private Continent mapContinent​(String p_line,
                               int p_lineNumber)
        The function takes a line of text and a line number, splits the line into values using the "=" delimiter, and creates a new Continent object with the line number, the first value as the name, and the second value as the population.
        Parameters:
        p_line - The parameter `p_line` is a string that represents a line of input data. It is expected to be in the format "continent_name=continent_population", where `continent_name` is a string representing the name of the continent and `continent_population` is an integer representing the population of the continent
        p_lineNumber - The line number of the input line being processed.
        Returns:
        The method is returning a Continent object.

      • mapTerritory

        private Country mapTerritory​(String p_line,
                             int p_lineNumber,
                             LinkedHashMap<String,​Continent> p_continents,
                             LinkedHashMap<String,​String[]> p_countryNameToNeighborNames)
        The function maps a territory by creating a Country object and adding it to the list of countries in a continent, while also storing the neighboring countries.
        Parameters:
        p_line - The parameter `p_line` is a string that represents a line of data containing information about a country.
        p_lineNumber - The line number of the current line being processed.
        p_continents - A LinkedHashMap that maps continent names to Continent objects. Each Continent object represents a continent and contains information about the continent.
        p_countryNameToNeighborNames - A LinkedHashMap that maps a country name to an array of its neighbor names.
        Returns:
        The method is returning an instance of the Country class.
